RADIANCE RENDERING ARTIFACTS PROBLEM - SEVERE GRAIN IN INDIRECT=20 ILLUMINATION

Please can any Radiance users assist with a rendering error on = an=20 architectural illustration project.

Severe grain appears in a Radiance render where indirect = illumination=20 strikes an interior floor, similar to a moir=E9 pattern. Some grain in = Radiance=20 images is easily corrected with PFILT using down-sampling and a radial = blur=20 filter, but the artifacts encountered were too severe for this to be=20 effective.
